list_translation_mean.translate_mean: ru lô của máy cán cao su

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or cause to move in a particular direction by turning over and over on an axis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car rolled down into a ditch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe lăn xuống một cái mương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a vehicle) move or run on wheels.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the van was rolling along the highway
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc xe đang lăn dọc đường cao tốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: turn (something flexible) over and over on itself to form a cylinder, tube, or ball.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he rolled the handkerchief into a ball
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta lăn khăn tay vào một quả bóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: flatten or spread (something) by using a roller or by passing it between rollers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: roll out the dough on a floured surface
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lăn bột trên một bề mặt bột

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a loud, deep sound such as that of thunder or drums) reverberate.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the first peals of thunder rolled across the sky
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những tiếng sấm sét đầu tiên lăn trên bầu trời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: rob (someone, typically when they are intoxicated or asleep).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if you don't get drunk, you don't get rolled
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu bạn không say, bạn không bị lăn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cylinder formed by winding flexible material around a tube or by turning it over and over on itself without folding.
a movement in which someone or something turns or is turned over on itself.
a prolonged, deep, reverberating sound, typically made by thunder or a drum.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sấm sét nổ tung, lăn sau cuộn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a very small loaf of bread, to be eaten by one person.
an official list or register of names.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the school had no one by his name on its roll
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trường không có ai bằng tên của mình trên cuộn của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hidden by the roll of the land was a refinery
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bị ẩn bởi cuộn đất là một nhà máy lọc dầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a roller for flattening something, especially one used to shape metal in a rolling mill.
